name: Explode Boxes in 1 Minute
description:
In this game you have to blow up the boxes in this game to get as much score as possible in 1 minute,

We made this game to experiment with making games with high-quality graphics, and we also made the Devlog for this game, so if you are interested in watching the Devlog video for making this game,

click this link: (video devlog is still in the editing process)
